description:
The soon to be five year old daughter Reina of black marketing lending company president Saeki and his wife Hiroko is kidnapped. The kidnapper demands they bring a 100 million yen ransom to Beika Central Park. He choosestheir housekeeper Suzuko to transport the money, and Conan finds it odd he didn`t choose a family member. Following Kogoro`s advice, Megure has GPS transmitters attached to the bag containing the ransom money, under the car, and in the brooch on Suzuko`s breast. After arriving at the park, wary of transmitters, the kidnapper instructs Suzuko to change cars and bags over the phone. Furthermore, the kidnapper issues instructions to Suzuko to outwit the police and foil their plans...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cent millions de yens à rattraper
